sentences.en: A lot of small companies are having to fight for survival (= work hard in order to continue to exist ) .
sentences.cn: 很多小公司不得不挣扎求生。

sentences.en: Commercial exploitation of resources threatens our survival.
sentences.cn: 开发自然资源作商业用途威胁我们的生活.

sentences.en: He mistakenly ascribes the expression "survival of the fittest" to Charles Darwin.
sentences.cn: 他错误地认为“适者生存”是查尔斯·达尔文说的。

sentences.en: He was told that he had a one in 500 chance of survival.
sentences.cn: 他被告知有五百分之一的生存机会。

sentences.en: I dare to hope that your heart will be touched by the tidings of my survival.
sentences.cn: 我奢望你在听到我还活着的消息时心情会很激动。

sentences.en: If cancers are spotted early, there's a high chance of survival.
sentences.cn: 如果癌症在早期发现的话，存活的几率会很高。

sentences.en: Life became a struggle for survival.
sentences.cn: 生活成了一场奋力求生的斗争。

sentences.en: Pragmatically, MTV's survival depends on selling the youth market to advertisers.
sentences.cn: 从务实角度来说，音乐电视网的生存依赖于把年轻人市场卖给广告商。

sentences.en: The arrival of this South American predator threatened the survival of native species.
sentences.cn: 这种南美肉食动物的到来威胁到了当地物种的生存.

sentences.en: The campaign will hopefully ensure the survival of the tiger.
sentences.cn: 这场运动有望确保老虎的生存.

sentences.en: The cult is a survival from the old Zoroastrian religion.
sentences.cn: 这种膜拜仪式是古老的拜火教遗留下来的。

sentences.en: The doctors gave him a one in ten chance of survival .
sentences.cn: 医生说他有十分之一的生存希望。

sentences.en: The name of the game is survival.
The old man was a survival of a past age.
sentences.cn: 这位老人是上一代的遗老.

sentences.en: The specialist who carried out the brain scan thought Tim's chances of survival were still slim.
sentences.cn: 给蒂姆做脑部扫描的专科医生认为他活下来的可能性仍旧渺茫。

sentences.en: They are still fighting for survival.
sentences.cn: 他们还在为生存而斗争.

sentences.en: They may hate what he does but their survival depends on him.
sentences.cn: 他们或许讨厌他的营生，但他们要想活下来必须依靠他。

sentences.en: We all have a strong survival instinct.
sentences.cn: 每个人都有强烈的求生本能.

words.tran_cn: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
活命主义者；成功地活下来的人
幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物

phrases.tran_cn: (生)（达尔文进化论中的）适者生存。 比较natural selection
生存价值；生存值；存活值

trans.tran_en: the state of continuing to live or exist
